name: Life Notes
headLine: Life Monitoring - Symptoms Tracking
description: Life Notes is an app that allows you to record your chronic symptoms and lifestyle habits on a daily basis in order to monitor them, but also to potentially highlight some correlations.

name: Curry Chronicles
headLine: Cooking website
description: This is a website that simply aims to bring together the recipes that we know and like to make. If you came here thinking of finding great food, then I'm sorry for you.

name: Time Series Data Collector
headLine: Time Series Database tool
description: Generic time series data collector / exporter. Currently, only Prometheus is available as a data source. It offers the following features: Get time series from a start timestamp to an end point, get the last X seconds of a time series, search for a time series of a finite size anywhere in the past, get time series considering only a start point, export the time series in JSON or CSV files via a shared volume or web services, one of the main advantages of these features is that they don't have any size limit for the time series. If the time series database has its own limit, TSDC will split the queries automatically and reconstruct the whole time series. The solution is containerized.

name: Centralized Monitoring
headLine: Team dashboard solution
description: This is an external aggregated dashboard that can provide operation and dev team with a simple view of the health of the various environments and also allow us to better troubleshoot issues and reduce TCO. Every monitored system is clickable so it can be used as bookmarks. This can also be used as a radiator on multiple screen.

name: Prometheus Metric Tools
headLine: tools on top of the Prometheus JVM Client
description: This is just a set of tools on top of the Prometheus JVM Client. The goal is to simplify the use of the client and add some features. This project is currently focused on the Gauge metric collectors, particularly on the labels.

name: Byonnd
headLine: Build Your Own Neural Network Design
description: Vanilla Javascript graphic library to design neural networks on HTML5 canvas. This designer can handle 3 types of neural networks: Multilayer Perceptrons (MLP), Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), Recurrent Neural Network (RNN).

name: Connect-4 AI
headLine: Artificial Intelligence for Connect-4
description: The Connect Four game with a dataset generator, playable by humans or AI. This project was created within the context of the organization of an internal hackathon at Nokia, bringing together 60 people around the theme of machine learning for 2 days.

name: Kimi
headLine: It's my cat.
description: This isn't a project. It's my cat. She's the cutest cat ever. She's never gonna give you up, she's never gonna let you down, she's never gonna run around and desert you.

name: Zeldus
headLine: Like Zelda but no
description: I made this thing when I was approximately 4.5 years old. Exceptional lifespan of 4 minutes.

name: Jays
headLine: Video game draft
description: This is the beginning of a video game that we made with the personal challenge to do it 100% from scratch. Way harder and time consuming than we expected, so it's far to be finished, but I'll always love this thing.

name: Magic Counter
headLine: Simple board game counter
description: I just wanted a life counter to play Magic The Gathering with my friends, and I was tired to see so much apps so simple to do, full of ads. So here's one without ads.

name: My Portfolio
headLine: You're already there
